attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
mp`s voting on a 10% pay increase for themselves
while restricting everybody else to 2%
and claiming no money in kitty to back date police salary
but can find the money to pay themselves 10% this is nothing but greed encouraged by a corrupt government.
are mp`s in parliment to look after the country and the people?  or just to line they own pockets at the countries expense? 
if mp`s can vote themselves 10%
let all unions ask fo rthe same amount fof all the workers both in private and government sector

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
